name: Dungeon Slasher (HarkDev)
description:
Dungeon Slasher is a small  Action Adventure game with procedural generated content.
Every world is randomly created and contains a random amount of enemies at random locations. Dungeons are procedurally generated as well.

Disclaimer: Possible Bugs, unbalanced.

Small project developed in Unity within 2 months by 3 university students.
Psydos: Hark,  Lexie, Pissdulf
Theme: 2D Development in Unity + Procedural Generation.

Assets used:

  • https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-dungeon-tileset
  • https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
  • https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy
  • https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/undead-executioner
  • https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/szadiart/page/2/

Music by Ixtlaxt

Sounds:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/15-monster-gruntpaindeath-sounds
  • https://opengameart.org/content/monster-sound-effects-2
  • https://opengameart.org/content/swish-bamboo-stick-weapon-swhoshes
  • https://opengameart.org/content/monster-sound-effects-pack
